itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Top (Costume). sockets. 
- Item effect: Moving Speed +2
It can be obtained by heating Calpheon Noble Costume.
- The potential of the crystal can be transfused to equipment items through Black Spirit.

item.name: [Warrior] Calpheon Noble Costume
item.desc: A suit for Calpheon aristocrats. It's both fabulous and practical.\n- Item effect: Amity +15% from a conversation\n- Use "Heating" to extract Ancient Spirit's Crystal: Swiftness from this item.
